# CKRecord.SystemFieldKey

**Enumeration**

Possible values for types of system field keys on records.

## Declaration

```swift
enum SystemFieldKey
```

## Overview

Use the values [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKRecord/SystemFieldKey/share] and [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKRecord/SystemFieldKey/parent] when creating an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSPredicate] for a [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKQuery] to reference a record’s [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKRecord/share] or [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKRecord/parent] property, respectively.

## Types of Shared Records

- **parent**: A value that represents the parent property of a record.
- **share**: A value that represents the share property of a record.

## Type Properties

- **creationDate**
- **creatorUserRecordID**
- **lastModifiedUserRecordID**
- **modificationDate**
- **recordID**

## Sharing Records

- **parent**: A reference to the record’s parent record.
- **share**: A reference to the share object that determines the share status of the record.
- **CKRecord.Reference**: A relationship between two records in a record zone.
- **setParent(_:)**: Creates and sets a reference object for a parent from its record.
- **setParent(_:)**: Creates and sets a reference object for a parent from the parent’s record ID.
